statements: DELETE FROM SoilSamples WHERE pH < 6 AND FieldID = 'a1234567-a89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM SoilSamples WHERE FieldID = '4dc598e5-b1f7-4b64-a537-5b116e51b9fb' AND SampleDate = '2022-03-15';
DELETE FROM research_team WHERE researcher_id IN (5, 7, 9);
DELETE FROM field_data WHERE sample_date < '2022-01-01' AND pH_level >= 6.0;
DELETE FROM Field_Samples WHERE sample_id = 100 AND field_id = 25;
DELETE FROM research_projects WHERE project_name = 'Farm Soil Analysis';
